description: Name of the workgroup (WG) associated with the user’s warehouse access; likely a security or permission group; confirm exact meaning of WG with SME.
Code identifying a warehouse or site included in the user’s access scope via the workgroup.
Unique login or user ID for whom the warehouse access mapping applies.
User ID that created this mapping record.
Timestamp when the mapping record was created.
User ID that last updated this mapping record.
Timestamp when the mapping record was last updated.
